Articles.Content: Hey everyone. been following KSP for a few years, and finally committed to a purchase. Already done some experimentation with several orbiting patterns and space maneuvers. Looking forward to the future of KSP and the community.

Years?

Any hoo...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I didn\'t notice that... Years? ???

Ok, seems like years, my bad. One year perhaps. I don\'t remember time warp being available when I first played.
years, months, days or hours welcome to the forum .

Well, let\'s do the math:

Time warp was added 0.11. It\'s 0.14 now, and each update takes about a month, or 4 weeks. 14-11=3 or more months, you\'ve been following. 8)

Welcome to the forums!

Welcome to the KSP forums! Have fun, enjoy you stay!

Miauw!

Cat\'n witeken

Well, let\'s do the math:

Time warp was added 0.11. It\'s 0.14 now, and each update takes about a month, or 4 weeks. 14-11=3 or more months, you\'ve been following. 8)

Welcome to the forums!

0.14 took 2 months. 0.14.0->0.14.4 took 1 months. That\'s 3 months.

from 0.11 to 0.12 (1), 0.13 (1), 0.14 (2), 0.14.4 (1). That\'s at least 5 months .
